'''''Winter Wonderland''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to discover a [[Cryo Crystalfly]] beneath a snow pile.

==Gameplay Notes==
*The Northern coast between [[Wyrmrest Valley]] and [[Snow-Covered Path]] and Southern coast below the right waypoint of [[Starglow Cavern]] has some Cryo Crystalflies.

==Trivia==
* The Chinese name {{lang|"A Winter's Tale"|zh=一个冬天的童话}} is a reference to the poem {{lang|''{{w|Germany. A Winter's Tale}}''|zh=德国，一个冬天的童话}} by {{w|Heinrich Heine}}.
